showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Property Showcase Lot 1, No.1 Jalan Laksamana 1 Puteri Harbour 79250 Iskandar Puteri Johor Darul Ta'zim Weekdays: 9.00am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Serimbun is a freehold low-density residential development in Iskandar Puteri. The 215 units of double-story linked houses are spread out to have only nine units occupy each acre. Residents who make their home here would enjoy a comfortable built-up space of 1,993 sq. ft. onwards, that includes four bedrooms. Within the exclusive neighbourhood, a central garden, pockets of greenery and meandering waterways are woven into the landscape, so families can enjoy nature and the outdoors in a carefree way. The Coastal Highway, Second Link Expressway and North-South Expressway can be easily accessed from Serimbun, making it a breeze to reach other important destinations, including the vibrant Bukit Indah township, supermarkets, schools, shopping malls, Johor Bahru City, Singapore and farther afield.
